smooth-skies.set-fog-view-distance.descr: Set a custom view distance for the skybox fog. Higher numbers mean bluer skies.
smooth-skies.lower-sky-void-darkness.des: Lowers the required height for the sky to turn black to the world's lowest height. This prevents the sky turning black at a high Y value. Most noticeable in Skyblock-type worlds.
smooth-skies.clear-skies.description: Removes banding on the horizon, making the sky one uniform color. This is taken from grondag's Clear Skies mod.
